医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，尽管化学污染物含量较低，但地中海鱼类中的微塑料含量却很高研究人员最近在《食品》杂志上发表的一项研究发现，尽管镉和抗生素的含量较低，但受欢迎的地中海鱼类中却含有大量微塑料，这凸显了持续存在的环境问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/Study-finds-high-micro Plastic-levels-in-Mediterranean-fish-despite-low-chemical-contaminants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/Study-finds-high-microplasty-levels-in-Mediterranean-fish-despite-low-chemical-contaminants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f7e589c-f92b-4542-9a03-73807cd6314f Fri, 19 Apr 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Study finds high microplastic levels in Mediterranean fish despite low chemical contaminants
单克隆抗体 Prasinezumab 有望减缓帕金森病的快速进展《自然医学》最近的一项研究利用 II 期临床试验数据，评估了单克隆抗体 prasinezumab 在减缓快速进展型帕金森病患者运动症状进展方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/Monoclonal-antibody-Prasinezumab-shows-promise-in-slowing-rapid-Parkinsons-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240419/Monoclonal-antibody-Prasinezumab-shows-promise-in-slowing-rapid-Parkinsons-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4182601-5bcc-4e80-b166-8452a532194f Fri, 19 Apr 2024 00:40:00 -0400 Monoclonal antibody Prasinezumab shows promise in slowing rapid Parkinson's progression
人工智能在眼科检查中与人类相媲美：GPT-4 展示令人印象深刻的诊断能力研究人员将 GPT-4 等大型语言模型 (LLM) 的临床知识与人类眼科专家进行了比较，发现 GPT-4 在标准化测试的诊断推理方面可以与实习医生相媲美或超越。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/AI-rivals- humans-in-o眼科-exams-GPT-4s-impressive-diagnostic-skills-showcased.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/AI-rivals- humans-in-o眼科-exams-GPT-4s-impressive-diagnostic-skills-showcased.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c444f19-8850-48cc-897a-08c10f24d87f Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:59:00 -0400 AI rivals humans in ophthalmology exams: GPT-4's impressive diagnostic skills showcased
研究揭示了关键蛋白质在平衡病毒感染免疫反应中的作用研究人员揭示了一种特定蛋白质的调节机制，该蛋白质在平衡哺乳动物细胞中病毒感染引发的免疫反应中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Study-reveals-key- Proteins-role-in-balancing-immune-response-to-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Study-reveals-key- Proteins-role-in-balancing-immune-response-to-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eac07fdd-3aaf-4171-995d-510c17642f00 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Study reveals key protein's role in balancing immune response to viral infections
优化糖尿病护理远程医疗的新见解杂货店、机场和海滩不是内分泌科医生进行远程医疗就诊的好地方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/New-insights-to-optimize-telehealth-for-diabetes-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/New-insights-to-optimize-telehealth-for-diabetes-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a2edea2-6d8d-4bc1-b110-293da8161c0b Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:52:00 -0400 New insights to optimize telehealth for diabetes care
动物研究表明早期西方饮食习惯与持久记忆问题有关研究人员发现，老鼠过早接触西方饮食会导致海马依赖性记忆的长期损害，这是由乙酰胆碱信号传导中断介导的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Animal-study-suggests-early-Western-diet-exposure-linked-to- permanent-memory-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Animal-study-suggests-early-Western-diet-exposure-linked-to- permanent-memory-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee555a33-fb80-4f3b-b3be-845839d49169 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:48:00 -0400 Animal study suggests early Western diet exposure linked to lasting memory issues
饮食治疗对于 IBS 的治疗效果优于药物治疗对于肠易激综合症（IBS），饮食治疗比药物治疗更有效。这些是哥德堡大学进行的一项研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Dietary-treatments-outperform-medications-for-IBS-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Dietary-treatments-outperform-medications-for-IBS-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4efbcbfe-8a6b-4202-91ee-d9d812b0daff Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:43:06 -0400 Dietary treatments outperform medications for IBS management
研究发现，衰老会影响 COVID-19 患者的免疫反应和病毒动态一项对 1031 名住院 COVID-19 患者进行的研究发现，衰老会显着影响免疫反应、病毒动态和鼻腔微生物组，老年人会出现更严重的疾病症状和病毒清除延迟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Aging-affects-immune-response-and-virus-dynamics-in-COVID-19-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Aging-affects-immune-response-and-virus-dynamics-in-COVID-19-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a1a3d09-f1f0-4ab3-b070-84624c802541 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:35:00 -0400 Aging affects immune response and virus dynamics in COVID-19 patients, study finds
莱斯大学生物工程师获得 140 万美元用于对抗骨关节炎莱斯大学的生物工程师获得了 140 万美元的资助，作为由卫生高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 资助的多中心联盟的一部分，以制定扭转骨关节炎影响的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Rice-University-bioengineers-receive-2414M-to-combat-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Rice-University-bioengineers-receive-2414M-to-combat-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c523bd1-bf2a-4a0c-be30-5c28bf2b56f8 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:34:36 -0400 Rice University bioengineers receive $1.4M to combat osteoarthritis
纽瑟姆提出了一种折衷方案，以保护室内工人免受高温影响州长加文·纽瑟姆(Gavin Newsom)政府在长期寻求的保护室内工作人员免受酷热影响的规定上做出了妥协，称数万名监狱和看守所工作人员以及囚犯将不得不等待救济。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Newsom-offers-a-compromise-to-protect-indoor-workers-from-heat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Newsom-offers-a-compromise-to-protect-indoor-workers-from-heat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cf17354-fd31-43f6-b3ff-c09e8b777aad Thu, 18 Apr 2024 23:09:34 -0400 Newsom offers a compromise to protect indoor workers from heat
